meanings.sent1: The sky was the greyest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds were the greyest I had ever witnessed.
meanings.sent3: The greyest cat in the neighborhood always naps on my porch.
meanings.sent4: Her mood matched the greyest clouds before a storm.
meanings.sent5: The greyest stone in the garden seemed to absorb all the light around it.

meanings.definition: Most grey in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the greyest animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The old building was the greyest structure in the town.
meanings.sent3: The greyest sweater in her closet was her favorite for chilly days.
meanings.sent4: The greyest morning of the year greeted us with a heavy fog.
meanings.sent5: The greyest clouds hung low, threatening rain at any moment.
